website_summaries.verdict: Seasoned drone racing enthusiasts who want a great-looking drone with impressive speed and moves will appreciate this model.
pros: Speedy with a durable build that does a good job withstanding crashes
Can do 360-degree flips and take decent images
Sporty looks add to the fun it delivers
cons: Requires firmware update for optimal performance
Not ideal for novices, as it takes a little skill to learn to maneuver it

customer_reviews.title: One of Hubsan’s best!
customer_reviews.text: This is the funnest little sport racers I own. It is extremely well built and indestructible so far. It doesn’t have acro as promised but I am told a firmware update will be coming to fix this and the ability to self tune to your liking. That will put this ready to fly out of the box sport racer over the top! I simply love this thing and the flight time is very reasonable! Give a thumbs up if you found my review helpful. I will add video and pictures later. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Gadget

customer_reviews.title: Line of sight flyer  with no acro and bad reception
customer_reviews.text: The fpv doesn’t work well. Looses reception quickly and that’s too bad because the screen looks clear when it works. Need your own camera set up. Line a sight flyer. No acro
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto orozco

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok, nothing to write home about though.
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok, the flight time is wayyyy short and it’s pretty fast, but I would not consider it a racing drone. Acro mode stinks and uncontrollable. The price is a bit high. But it’s pretty stable in angle mode is prob the best thing about it. I’m just not getting very long flight time out of either battery. The remote chews through AA batteries also. If you have any kind of 3s or above racing drone you will not be satisfied with this bird. I don’t really use it for vids or photos. So I can’t judge it on that.
customer_reviews.author: Lawnboy1

customer_reviews.title: Bosses only
customer_reviews.text: Omg super fast and fun. 3x faster then the brushed Vers.
customer_reviews.author: God is great

customer_reviews.title: It's a fast drone
customer_reviews.text: If you want a cheaper very fast drone, this is your drone. If you want FPV drone, this ISN'T your drone. The camera is terrible and it's way too weak of a signal to fly more than 20 yards from you. The remote is also crap. It goes through batteries almost as fast as the drone does.
customer_reviews.author: wes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: Its a great bigginer its strong durable and flys amazing its fast and easy to handle i love flying it can take crashes durable trust me. its a great price the service is amayzing i havent been able to get it to record on the sd card and they have been helping me out so hoping i can start recording my flight soon i would buy another again with out a doubt.. the best buy it dont waite
customer_reviews.author: sergio lopez jr

customer_reviews.title: Don't by one of these
customer_reviews.text: Wife has had this thing for over a year and no matter what she does learn work put into it and money and wow she nor I can fly Damn thing it's every where I
customer_reviews.author: Donald Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It so durable when landing. Lucky I did a few 4 channel helicopters that's what made my fly easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Dtalktoo

customer_reviews.title: Works great until it doesn't.
customer_reviews.text: Flew great for a week, then randomly lost signal and flew into an old man's Buick. Flew another week with new props, then stopped powering up at all. Makes low voltage beeps with fully charged battery. I basically threw $200 in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hubsan jet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item had it for 23 days and it malfunctioned. Had never been wrecked until the issue happened. Now I can't figure out how to get a rep to help me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great drone for the price. 2 thumbs up Hubsan!
customer_reviews.text: Nice racing drone, not for beginners. Fast and durable. Definitely not for in doors. Transmitter battery dies quickly and no way to turn off the monitor if you dont want use it.
customer_reviews.author: anthony owens

customer_reviews.title: The H123D takes a nose dive in Acro Mode!
customer_reviews.text: The jet is very stable but the problem I ran into after updating firmware V2 1.1 is when I fly in A ro Mode the h123d takes a nose dive. I've tried calibrating and replacing props and I can't seem to fix this problem. So with out Acro you can't do flips etc so I don't know what to do next. Maybe I will co tact Hubsanus and see what they say. I hear the customer service is not that great but I'll give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Tech5960

customer_reviews.title: H123D Excelent
customer_reviews.text: I had already flown with the H122D, but the H123D is still much better. Fast but easy to control, without forgetting that we are talking about a drone of the racing type.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Ribes Garin

customer_reviews.title: This is a toy, not an Acro racer.
customer_reviews.text: If you fly race drones you will be very dissapointed. This is definitely a newbie toy. Lies lies lies. This does not have an acro mode. It has very bad PID settings for angle and horizon mode. Terrible prop wash. Terrible fpv distance, I'm guessing it has a 25mah vtx. Don't waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Drone-Krash

customer_reviews.title: H123D fine !
customer_reviews.text: I had already flown the H122D, but this drone flies like lightning and is fantastic. A great fun
customer_reviews.author: pedron patinagua

product_meta.title: Hubsan H123D X4 Jet Racing Drone 360°Flips Rolls FPV Racer Drone with 720P HD Camera Quadcopter with 5.8G LCD Screen Real Time Transmitter
feature_bullets: RC drone configuration: Hubsan H123D racing drone(with brushless motor)+ HT012D new version transmitter.
5.8G FPV Real time FPV photo/video transmission ,watch video on the LCD screen or take photos.
Aerobatic airplane H123D support aerobatic flight can 360°flips & rolls,maximum flight speed 20M/S.
Hubsan X4 H123D Jet flight time about 10 minutes ,charging time about 130 minutes.
Package: drone packaged with a nice box ready for gifting (Hubsan brand and new drone H123D).
